notes: Multiple instances of Buckler Aura do not stack. Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura.
Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.

additionalInformation: With Buckler Aura, the item grants a total of 3 armor to the wielder.
name: Buckler
description: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
trivia: In the transition from DotA to Dota 2, the item's name was changed from Nathrezim Buckler to simply Buckler. This is because of the Nathrezim being a race of demons called Dread Lords in Warcraft lore.
This is because of the Nathrezim being a race of demons called Dread Lords in Warcraft lore.
